title: Otoko no Ko Comic Anthology: Tenshin Ranman-hen
original_name: オトコの娘コミックアンソロジー ～天真爛漫編～
sinopse:
One-shot manga anthologies featuring traps. Each volume carries different theme.

Volume 4 theme: naivete

1. Tonari no Otoko no Ko [Tsumura Chita]
2. DatsuTeni [Yoshida Gorou]
3. Kawaii tte Iwanaide [Tomekichi]
4. Daishizen to Shizen-kei Tennen Kanojo? [うおぬまゆう]
5. Haru no Arashi [九重リココ]
6. Inocennt☆Angel [よつば ◎ ますみ。]
7. Hanasaka Power [Kuromame]
8. Leotard Life [Matan]
9. Shinigami no Yuuutsu [Matsumoto Mitohi.]
